cast.overview: After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the Gecko brothers head south to a seedy Mexican bar to hide out in safety, unaware of its notorious vampire clientele.
cast.title: From Dusk Till Dawn

details.biography: Heidi was born in Chattanooga Tennessee and raised in Burbank California.  She has been acting since the age of 3 and has been a member of the Screen Actors Guild since the early 1980's.  She has a degree in Culinary Arts and is also a singer and piano player.  She has performed in movies, TV shows and commercials, along with a large volume of print work in magazines and catalogs.  Heidi is married to Jeremy Greening and, with him, is raising their 9 children in a large home near Riverside California.
details.name: Heidi McNeal
